{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/title|replace_filename}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=fs_ts|1=
path&amp; replace_filename( const path&amp; replacement );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Replaces a single filename component with {{c|replacement}}.

Equivalent to the following:
{{source|1=
remove_filename();
operator/=(replacement);
}}

The behavior is undefined if the path has no filename component ({{ltt|cpp/experimental/fs/path/has_path|has_filename}} returns {{c|false}}).

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;experimental/filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::experimental::filesystem;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; fs::path("/foo").replace_filename("bar") &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; fs::path("/").replace_filename("bar") &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
"/bar"
"bar"
}}
